scenario_text.value:
I don’t see him, or Kunemon... Do you think
they were taken, too?

You don’t think the same thing that took Aoi
got them, too?
Shoot, I shouldn’t have left him here!

(Dust has only been disturbed in the corner
where Ryo was sitting. Nowhere else...)

(He didn’t even have time to fight back? It’s
like they were snatched in an instant...)

What’s with this enemy...? What can we do
against it?

It’s okay, I’ll keep my eyes peeled wide
open! So c’mon, let’s go and save everyone!
